basics.name: Vikas Singh
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: GURU JAMBESHWAR UNIVERSITY
work.summary: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, PHP, SQL, HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.
highlights: Improved website performance by optimizing code
responsibilities: Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement web applications using PHP, SQL and modern JavaScript frameworks.
Assisted in debugging and optimizing front-end code to ensure smooth user experiences.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving coding standards within the team.
achievements: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, PHP, SQL HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.

work.name: THE PRODUCT HOUSE
work.summary: I led community engagement and managed Discord moderation, successfully onboarding over 5,000 members. I collaborated with sponsors and facilitated both online and offline events, driving user engagement and brand visibility.
highlights: Onboarded 5,000+ community members and maintained high engagement through regular events and content.
responsibilities: Managed Discord moderation and community interactions.
Planned and executed events, workshops, and product launches.
Partnered with sponsors for collaborations and event sponsorship.
Developed content strategies to increase social media presence.
Engaged with users to maintain an active and positive community.
achievements: Hosted and launched 9+ events, including both online and offline formats.
Achieved over 10 million impressions through strategic content creation and marketing efforts.

work.name: WDM Agency
work.summary: I provided top-notch customer service through phone, email, and chat, resolving issues and processing orders. I maintained strong product knowledge to give accurate advice and consistently met performance targets, ensuring high customer satisfaction.
highlights: Consistently Met Or Exceeded Customer Service Performance Targets, Including Response Times And Customer Satisfaction Metrics.
responsibilities: Delivered exceptional customer service across phone, email, and chat.
Resolved customer issues efficiently and processed orders accurately.
Achieved and surpassed customer service metrics and performance targets.
Maintained a strong product knowledge base to assist customers effectively.
achievements: Delivered Excellent Customer Service Over The Phone, Email, and Chat, Addressing inquiries, Resolving Issues, And Processing Orders.
